name: Seance: The Unquiet (Demo 2)
description: Experience more of Holospark's vision for cinematic storytelling and character presence in VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space
